ComicInfo.Summary:
Overview
The first - ever zombie story from Dynamite that puts the "living" into the "living dead" concludes here in issue #4 of Raise the Dead!
Guided by writers John Reppion and Leah Moore and artist Hugo Petrus, Raise the Dead sets the stage for all - new undead tales and the debut of a startling new character - Dr. Jones - - whose ultimate fate is decided in this concluding issue!
Raise the Dead #4 feature two covers from two Zombie experts - Arthur (Marvel Zombies, Marvel Zombies VS. THE Army of Darkness) Suydam AND Sean (Marvel Zombies) Phillips!
*Notes:* The first two covers are a homage of Nirvana's album cover Nevermind.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/raise-the-dead-4-darkest-before-dawn/4000-111920/
ComicInfo.Title: Darkest Before Dawn
